name: FELIWAY MultiCat 30 Day Cat Calming Plug In Pheromone Diffuser Starter Kit, 48ml - Helps Reduce Conflicts and Signs of Tension in Multi-Cat Households
short_description: HELPS REDUCE COMMON SIGNS OF TENSION BETWEEN CATS: FELIWAY MultiCat, developed by the #1 vet recommended brand, helps reduce common signs of tension between cats such as: conflict, fighting, chasing, and blocking

ENHANCED CALM AT HOME FOR MULTICAT HOUSEHOLDS: FELIWAY MultiCat plug-in diffuser uses the science of pheromones to send calming messages that mimic a mother cat’s natural pheromones to help reduce tensions & conflicts. 84% of cat owners saw significant improvement in conflict between cats when using FELIWAY MultiCat
DRUG FREE & SAFE TO USE: FELIWAY diffusers are drug-free, non-sedating, and while cat pheromone analogs may help your cat, they won't affect humans or other pets
PROVIDES 4 WEEKS OF CALMING SUPPORT: With just one refill, the diffuser offers up to 30 days of continuous calming benefits, helping your cat feel calmer

COVERS LARGE LIVING SPACES: Each diffuser covers an area up to 700sqft, ensuring widespread calming support throughout your home for cats of all ages. To get started, simply plug your diffuser into an open outlet with 4+ feet of space to diffuse, with the vents pointed upward
#1 VET RECOMMENDED BRAND: FELIWAY MultiCat is trusted by vets to improve your cat’s well-being with an easy, hassle-free application, backed by 25+ years of expertise
product_description: Product Description FELIWAY MultiCat, from the #1 Vet Recommended Brand, is a diffuser designed to ease signs of conflict between cats, such as blocking, staring, fighting, and chasing. Using pheromone science, it promotes calm in multi-cat households by harnessing the natural message a mother cat releases through pheromones. Each refill provides up to 4 weeks of continuous support, covering up to 700 square feet of living space. Trusted by millions of cat families and backed by 25+ years of expertise, FELIWAY MultiCat offers an easy, effective solution for creating a peaceful, multi-cat household. Manufacturer's Notice 1)Behaviorists recommend one litter box per cat plus one. Where are they located, they should be spread all over the house, not placed in just one room. Is there a food and water bowl per cat, but not located near each other. 2)The product will last up to 30 days. If it lasted 27-30 days this is within the expected duration of use. The variation depends on the ambient temperature, humidity and air flow present in the house or where the diffuser is placed. 3) All pets respond to pheromones, but the degree to which they respond is determined by many factors. How severe is the stress the cat is experiencing currently (it is easier to prevent than treat), has there been any positive changes to the environment (adding extra resources like litter boxes and food bowl), what are the cat's previous experiences (if one cat had a bad experience with a housemate they may have learned not to trust other cats).

short_description: SAFE MADE: Our dog anxiety relief pheromone analogue is formulated with all-natural ingredients. SAFE MADE for dog calming that provides a drug-free solution to help calm and relax your dog using natural nursing pheromones, suitable for home use.

COVERAGE UP TO 700 SQUARE FEET: TopSum anxiety relief for dogs calming starter kit is designed to cover an area of up to 700 square feet effectively. For optimal performance, position the diffuser with vents facing upward. Place the device in a location where your dog(s) spend the most time, and ensure it is not blocked by shelves, doors, curtains, or furniture.

REDUCE STRESS: TopSum dog calming diffuser helps alleviate common signs of stress in dogs, such as pacing, panting, and barking. Our dog pheromones calming diffuser addresses stress triggers including visitors, loud noises, separation anxiety, and conflicts between dogs caused by environmental changes. This pheromone diffuser for dogs is specifically designed to provide calming effects for dogs.

NOTICEABLE RESULTS IN TWO WEEKS: TopSum Dog Anxiety Relief Pheromones emit a strong signal of safety and comfort to your dogs. Users typically observe improvements in about two weeks after using this calming diffuser, with approximately 85% reporting positive outcomes.

USER -FRIENDLY DESIGN: Simply plug the dog diffuser into any standard electrical outlet to release calming pheromones into your home. Its compact and portable design makes it ideal for use during travel or when facing temporary environmental changes. Refills are very easy to replace, ensuring continuous use without hassle.

short_description: ENHANCED FELINE PHEROMONE COMFORT Formulated with a synthetic feline pheromone blend inspired by classic calming solutions, this refill helps promote a calm, comfortable indoor environment for cats. Supports emotional balance and everyday comfort for feline cats.

IDEAL FOR MULTI-CAT & INDOOR HOMES Designed for multi-cat and multicat households, this calming pheromone refill helps reduce common tension triggers such as scratching, spraying, peeing, and urine marking when used consistently in shared rooms.

CONTINUOUS 2X 30-DAY CALMING SUPPORT (48ML) Each 48ml refill provides up to 30 days of continuous, passive pheromone diffusion. Odorless, non-aromatic formula with no added scent—safe and friendly for cats, kittens, and pet parents sensitive to smells.

SUPPORTS RELAXED CAT BEHAVIOR Helps support relaxed, calming behavior in anxious or aggressive situations such as environmental changes, new pets, or routine disruptions. Many users report improved comfort and reduced stress-related behaviors with regular use.

EASY PLUG-IN REFILL SYSTEM Compatible with standard plug-in diffusers, this refill is simple to install—just plug in and let it work continuously. Ideal for bedrooms, living rooms, or any indoor space where cats stay most of the time.

product_description: FELIWAY® Optimum is our best option for reducing common signs of cat stress, such as urine spraying, scratching, fears, tension, and conflict. The patented formula in FELIWAY® Optimum helps cats with more signs of stress, in more situations, and calms cats better than ever. FELIWAY® Optimum provides up to 4 weeks of continuous calming support with each refill, helping your cat feel secure and relaxed every day. Each diffuser covers an area up to 700 square feet, it’s effective for large living areas and is suitable for cats of all ages. Easy to use, it’s the perfect way to promote your cat’s well-being and reduce stress-related behaviors.

Directions FELIWAY Optimum refills provide calming pheromones continually for up to 30 days in a 700 square foot area. We recommend using an additional diffuser if the room is bigger than 700 square feet. We recommend plugging in the FELIWAY Optimum diffuser in the room where you cat spends the most time. Try not to plug the diffuser under items (e.g. shelves) or close to objects (e.g. behind curtain or doors) as this affects efficacy. We do not recommend plugging your diffuser in near your litterbox or in a hallway - your cat likely does not spend as much time in the places as you'd think. Use FELIWAY Optimum each month to create a constant calming environment for your cat. Each refill will last up to 30 days - we recommend replacing your refills on a monthly basis. Check the diffuser monthly and replace it twice a year (every six months) to guarantee the best effect. Do not use another plugin with FELIWAY Optimum refills. Additionally, do not use a FELIWAY Optimum diffuser with a refill of another brand. Make sure you are using a FELIWAY Optimum diffuser with your FELIWAY Optimum vials and refills. Each FELIWAY Optimum Diffuser comes with a plug adapted to the local electric systems. Please do not use this diffuser in a another country that has a different voltage or with an adapter: it may conduct serious security concerns. Make sure that your diffuser has the fitting plug for your country before plugging in.
Age Range Description All Life Stages

name: ThunderEase Dog Calming Pheromone Spray | Powered by ADAPTIL | Reduce Anxiety During Travel, Vet Visits and Boarding
short_description: ThunderEase is vet recommended brand and uses the ADAPTIL pheromone analog
Helps dogs adjust to challenging situations like separation, thunderstorms, and visitors, and curb unwanted stress-related behaviors like hiding, barking, and destructive behaviors.
ThunderEase is drug free and helps ease your dog’s stress related behaviors by mimicking the calming pheromone that a mother dog releases while nursing her puppies
Over 80% of pet parents surveyed reported improvement in their pet’s signs of stress when using ThunderEase.
Use ThunderEase Spray at home and on-the-go Great for car rides, vet visits, and enhancing the effectiveness of the ThunderShirt
To use simply spray on the ThunderShirt, blanket, or in a designated area 15 minutes before use for added calm. DO NOT SPRAY directly on your dog.
Consider combining ThunderEase with ThunderShirt and ThunderWunders calming chews to create your calming dream team

Trust the Dog Calming Experts at ThunderWorks with our 100% Satisfaction Guarantee if you are not completely satisfied, return to your place of purchase within 60 days for a refund of your purchase price.
product_description: When new pups are born, their mother naturally emits pheromones that give the puppies a sense of security and comfort. These pheromones help dogs bond to each other and their mom. ThunderEase replicates these pheromones for a drug-free, vet-recommended, calming solution that puts an end to unwanted behaviors like destructive chewing and problem barking. ThunderEase is effective in treating: - Fear of loud noises like thunder and fireworks - Uneasiness in a new home or environment - Stress when socializing or during training - Problem barking - Destructive chewing - House-soiling (or “uh-ohs” as we like to call them) - Travel anxiety such as shaking, vomiting, panting, agitation, and salivation - Stress when visiting the vet. - Anxiety when boarding or kenneling - Stress caused by changes in the environment like new furniture or remodeling.Spray 8-10 pumps on the inside of your car or directly on collars, kennels, leashes, blankets, and bandannas. Let sit for 15 minutes before introducing your dog. Respray every 4-5 hours as needed.
